original_text: Then Jeremiah said to the family of the Rekabites, “This is what the Lord Almighty, the God of Israel, says: ‘You have obeyed the command of your forefather Jehonadab and have followed all his instructions and have done everything he ordered.’
korean_text: 예레미야가 레갑 사람의 가문에게 이르되 만군의 여호와 이스라엘의 하나님께서 이와 같이 말씀하시기를 너희가 너희 선조 요나답의 명령을 순종하여 그의 모든 규율을 지키며 그가 너희에게 명령한 것을 행하였도다

sentences.original_text: Then Jeremiah said to the family of the Rekabites
This is what the Lord Almighty
You have obeyed the command of your forefather Jehonadab
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희 조상 여호나답의 명령을 순종하였고

sentences.original_text: and have followed all his instructions
and have done everything he ordered
